name: DD: Dark Arisen
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish,  Japanese.  Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".  An epitaph speaks of another's demise...  A mysterious island known as Bitterblack Isle appears off the coast of Gransys. Its depths have claimed the lives of many Arisen; their voices still haunt the labyrinth that lies deep beneath its surface--a labyrinth ripe with secrets waiting to be discovered.  The time to take up arms has come once again. Delve into the isle's depths and uncover its dark secret!
